endpoints.description: Retrieve the current inventory levels including product details, quantities, and expiration dates.
Place a new order for replenishment based on required inventory thresholds.
Fetch detailed information about a specific item in the inventory by its ID.
Remove an item from the inventory list using its unique ID.
Analyze and retrieve trending data on sales to help inform stocking decisions.
Make manual adjustments to the inventory levels for discrepancies or corrections.
Obtain notifications related to upcoming product expirations or low stock levels.
Mark notifications as acknowledged to maintain streamlined operations.
Access a summarized report of sales over a selected time period.
Start a comprehensive inventory check process for actual stock verification.
